Steps.StepString: Attempted to include malicious payload with path traversal attack into the file inclusion parameter, such as ../../../../../../etc/passwd
Included '/etc/passwd' file in response, confirming the presence of a file inclusion vulnerability
Researched application's system and network configuration to craft a payload containing a script to execute arbitrary code on the server and send output to an attacker-controlled server
Submitted payload containing a script to execute arbitrary code on the server and send output to an attacker-controlled server
Executed arbitrary code on the server, obtained sensitive information, and established a persistent backdoor to the server
